title: Completed PE Summary - Sunrise and Ocean Dawn

Flag: UK

Built: 1987

Length overall: 26.5

Synopsis

Two fishing vessels engaged in Pair Trawling made contact in rough weather. One of the vessels was holed below the waterline but managed to survive the resulting flooding.

Action taken:

No specific recommendations were made as a result of this PE.
